body.name: Merries Baby Diapers Large Size 54 Counts with Moony Wipes Bundle
features: Exceptional quality: only top-quality materials are used for the production of Japanese diapers. Therefore, the cases of diaper rash or dermatitis are especially rare even through the baby's skin is sensitive. An exceptional feature of Japanese diapers – they have no "chemical" odor which becomes especially pungent when diapers are full!

Closer to nature: Merries diapers are manufactured using only ecologically clean and safe materials which do not contain formaldehyde, phthalates or petroleum-based products! Merries tapes do not contain lotions, fragrances or synthetic aromas!

Reduce stuffiness - one factor of skin irritation: the fabric includes a 3-layer air-through system. The 1st layer is a soft airy surface, an airy wavy mesh enhances breathability, allowing air to pass through to the 2nd absorbent layer, and then air passes to the 3rd all around breathable sheet layer. Breathability that removes moisture and stuffiness is so important!

Ultra-soft, fluffy and breathing: air soft surface contains 2 convex shapes: large and small. Large convex shape allows quickly absorb pee and poo, while small convex shape is intended for preventing spreading of poo around diaper. Both side parts are made of multiple fine waves(=convex-concave)! The wavy surface reduces the skin contact area so that it does not stick to baby's skin! Newly mounted on center part's volume-absorbent zone!

Soft reusable magic seal and color-changing wetness indicators: the green seal is easy to spot even during night changes. The corners are rounded and made of a soft material that is gentle and does not scratch the baby's skin. When the strips change color to dark blue, it is time to change the diaper! There's no design around the strips, making it easy to see when the color changes. Merries diapers come in a bundle with Americas Toys branded wipes.
body.description: INSPIRED Moony and Moony man products have superior gentile qualities that are designed to adapt to all stages of your precious child's growth. This is why we got to the bottom of all of the care that is put into Moony and Moony man products. We will report on the inquisitive minds of the developers, and their wishes they placed in their product, for you and your baby. FEATURES: NEW TECHNOLOGY! Full-coverage high waist design! They match exactly the baby's inner thighs so there is no gap for leaks even with active babies! Super absorbent, highly breathable and ultra-soft so your active baby stays dry and comfortable! Instantly draws in and locks away pee, leaving the diaper surface drier for longer usage! Stays dry with leak prevention. Even the babies with high body temperature and tends to be sweating a lot, this diaper can keep their bottom dry! Clean-up is simple with the roll-up tape. Roll up a diaper with the dirty surface inside, and use the tape in the back to fasten. The notice indicator line will change into bluish green color, so you can know when to change diaper. Does not stick to your baby's skin so your baby stays dry and comfortable. Fit snugly in all positions, stretch gently around your baby's waist. No red marks or abrasions at the crotch area! DESCRIPTION: Moony’s unique dual channel absorbent core instantly draws in and locks away pee, leaving the diaper surface drier for longer usage. Breathable soft wavy top sheet does not stick to your baby's skin so your baby stays dry and comfortable. The airy soft gathers fit snugly in all positions. They are made with breathable soft material ensuring dryness around the waist area, where your baby tends to perspire easily. Let your active baby play in utmost comfort.

productInformation.value: #46,826 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #437 in Disposable Diapers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is the best !!
reviews.reviewText: Super soft and great quality!!! A bit pricey, but when I tried Huggies when I run out of those, and we got rush right away. So I buy those and keep the stock now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: My favorite diapers. I tried all Japanese diapers available on Amazon. Moony are the best. Extremely soft and absorbent, thin, looks comfortable and work great. They are much softer than Huggies special delivery. I use them for night time only though since they are double the price compared to other regular diapers. For day time, I use pampers swaddlers or huggies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best diapers!!!! No rash, no cream or powder needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try these diapers because I have heard a lot of good reviews about them. But they leaked the first night! That is the first time in 9 months that I had to change my baby at night, usually diapers were able to hold till the morning. 3 stars because they seem to be soft and comfortable during the day, but we will go back to our previous ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Super soft, great fit, rarely leaks/ blows out, and cute designs 😙

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made and unsafe for baby
reviews.reviewText: Diaper is soft. BUT, there is a safety issue with the bag of diaper we received. The elastic string inside the leak guard is poorly constructed within and becomes loose shortly after use and fell apart. This could be especially dangerous and cause injury to the baby if the baby is a boy where he gets tangled by the string. The diaper is priced at premium but poorly made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely amazing diapers that are incredibly soft and absorbent. And they left no markings on my kids waist. Expensive but if your kids sensitive to the weirdest things try these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Very soft and light ! My daughter sleeps all night without changing !
